name: Yimeng Feng
content: Yimeng Feng - Macquarie University View Scopus Profile Yimeng Feng Dr Lecturer in Computing (loT and Networking), School of ComputingFuture Communications Research CentreData Horizons Research CentreSmart Green Cities Research CentreAdvanced Drone Systems Research CentreFinTech and Banking Research Centre https://orcid.org/0000-0002-3605-6829 Emailyimeng.fengmq.eduau h-index 141 Citations 5 h-index Calculated based on number of publications stored in Pure and citations from Scopus 20162025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyDr. Yimeng Feng joined the School of Computing at Macquarie University, Sydney, Australia in July 2023 as a Lecturer (Assistant Professor) in Computing. She has been an Associate Director of International Engagement in the School of Computing since Dec 2024. Before she joined Macquarie University, she was a Postdoctoral Research Associate at the School of Computer Science and Engineering, University of New South Wales, Sydney, Australia, and a Visiting Research Fellow at the Hawkesbury Institute for the Environment, Western Sydney University, Sydney, Australia. She received her dual Ph.D. degrees from the Faculty of Engineering and IT, the University of Technology Sydney, and the State Key Laboratory of Networking and Switching Technology, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications.  She received her dual Bachelor's degrees from the Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications and the Queen Mary University of London. She has obtained a high level of achievements, including papers, scholarships, awards, commercialized patents, and professional activities. Research interestsDr. Yimeng Feng's research interests include Intelligent Transportation Systems, the Internet of Things, Service Computing, and Wireless Sensor Network technology. Her professional experiences include mentoring and supervising Ph.D., Master students, and Honours students, as well as serving as a reviewer and TPC member for a number of IEEE/ACM top conferences and journals. PhD scholarships If you are interested in doing a PhD or MRes at Macquarie under my supervision, and are eligible to apply for any of the scholarships listed here, then please contact me in advance of the closing dates.
